name: Jazz Combo
description: Jazz combo with piano, upright bass, and woodwind solos

performance.notes: Jazz combo using 3 instruments. Piano provides comping chords (slightly left). Woodwind (sax) plays melody (slightly right). Strings (upright bass) provide foundation (center). Light reverb (0.25) with small room (0.4) simulates jazz club. Swing feel (0.58) adds groove. Velocity humanization (0.15) adds organic feel. Medium tempo (120 BPM) for swing. Creates authentic jazz combo sound.
performance.technique: Piano + sax + bass = jazz trio. Light reverb = jazz club. Swing = groove. Humanization = organic feel. Piano = comping. Sax = melody. Bass = foundation.
performance.tip: Swing is essential (0.55-0.6). Light reverb for jazz club. Humanization = organic. Piano comping = sparse. Sax = expressive. Bass = walking.
